Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • saveourplanet.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    jamienevin A class to store all information pertaining to each Player, and their respective owned Squares / Fields.
